00028 #include "qpn_port.h"                                       /* QP-nano port */

00030 #ifndef Q_NHSM
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qepn)
00032 #endif
00033 
00041 #define QEP_EMPTY_SIG_        0
00042 
00044 #define QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_   5
00045 
00046 /*..........................................................................*/

00049     static char const Q_ROM Q_ROM_VAR version[] = "4.0.04";

00053 #ifndef Q_NFSM
00054 /*..........................................................................*/
00055 void QFsm_init(QFsm *me) {
00056     (void)(*me->state)(me);      /* execute the top-most initial transition */
00057 
00058     Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_ENTRY_SIG;
00059     (void)(*me->state)(me);                             /* enter the target */
00060 }
00061 /*..........................................................................*/
00062 #ifndef QK_PREEMPTIVE
00063 void QFsm_dispatch(QFsm *me) {
00064 #else
00065 void QFsm_dispatch(QFsm *me) Q_REENTRANT {
00066 #endif
00067     QStateHandler s = me->state;
00068 
00069     if ((*s)(me) == Q_RET_TRAN) {                      /* transition taken? */
00070         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;
00071         (void)(*s)(me);                                  /* exit the source */
00072 
00073         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_ENTRY_SIG;
00074         (void)(*me->state)(me);                         /* enter the target */
00075     }
00076 }
00077 #endif                                                            /* Q_NFSM */
00078 
00079 #ifndef Q_NHSM
00080 /*..........................................................................*/
00081 QState QHsm_top(QHsm *me) {
00082     (void)me;             /* supress the "unused argument" compiler warning */
00083     return Q_IGNORED();                 /* the top state ignores all events */
00084 }
00085 /*..........................................................................*/
00086 void QHsm_init(QHsm *me) {
00087     QStateHandler t;
00088 
00089     Q_ALLEGE((*me->state)(me) == Q_RET_TRAN);/* initial tran. must be taken */
00090 
00091     t = (QStateHandler)&QHsm_top;         /* an HSM starts in the top state */
00092     do {                              /* drill into the target hierarchy... */
00093         QStateHandler path[QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_];
00094         int8_t ip = (int8_t)0;
00095 
00096         path[0] = me->state;
00097         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00098         (void)(*me->state)(me);
00099         while (me->state != t) {
00100             path[++ip] = me->state;
00101             (void)(*me->state)(me);
00102         }
00103         me->state = path[0];
00104                                             /* entry path must not overflow */
00105         Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00106 
00107         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_ENTRY_SIG;
00108         do {        /* retrace the entry path in reverse (correct) order... */
00109             (void)(*path[ip])(me);                        /* enter path[ip] */
00110         } while ((--ip) >= (int8_t)0);
00111 
00112         t = path[0];
00113         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_INIT_SIG;
00114     } while ((*t)(me) == Q_RET_TRAN);        /* initial transition handled? */
00115     me->state = t;
00116 }
00117 /*..........................................................................*/
00118 #ifndef QK_PREEMPTIVE
00119 void QHsm_dispatch(QHsm *me) {
00120 #else
00121 void QHsm_dispatch(QHsm *me) Q_REENTRANT {
00122 #endif
00123     QStateHandler path[QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_];
00124     QStateHandler s;
00125     QStateHandler t;
00126     QState r;
00127 
00128     t = me->state;                                /* save the current state */
00129 
00130     do {                             /* process the event hierarchically... */
00131         s = me->state;
00132         r = (*s)(me);                             /* invoke state handler s */
00133     } while (r == Q_RET_SUPER);
00134 
00135     if (r == Q_RET_TRAN) {                             /* transition taken? */
00136         int8_t ip = (int8_t)(-1);            /* transition entry path index */
00137         int8_t iq;                    /* helper transition entry path index */
00138 
00139         path[0] = me->state;           /* save the target of the transition */
00140         path[1] = t;
00141 
00142         while (t != s) {    /* exit current state to transition source s... */
00143             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;        /* find superstate of t */
00144             if ((*t)(me) == Q_RET_HANDLED) {        /* exit action handled? */
00145                 Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00146                 (void)(*t)(me);                     /* find superstate of t */
00147             }
00148             t = me->state;                /* me->state holds the superstate */
00149         }
00150 
00151         t = path[0];                            /* target of the transition */
00152 
00153         if (s == t) {      /* (a) check source==target (transition to self) */
00154             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;
00155             (void)(*s)(me);                              /* exit the source */
00156             ip = (int8_t)0;                             /* enter the target */
00157         }
00158         else {
00159             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00160             (void)(*t)(me);                    /* find superstate of target */
00161             t = me->state;
00162             if (s == t) {                /* (b) check source==target->super */
00163                 ip = (int8_t)0;                         /* enter the target */
00164             }
00165             else {
00166                 Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00167                 (void)(*s)(me);                /* find superstate of source */
00168 
00169                                   /* (c) check source->super==target->super */
00170                 if (me->state == t) {
00171                     Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;
00172                     (void)(*s)(me);                      /* exit the source */
00173                     ip = (int8_t)0;                     /* enter the target */
00174                 }
00175                 else {
00176                                          /* (d) check source->super==target */
00177                     if (me->state == path[0]) {
00178                         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;
00179                         (void)(*s)(me);                  /* exit the source */
00180                     }
00181                     else { /* (e) check rest of source==target->super->super..
00182                             * and store the entry path along the way
00183                             */
00184                         iq = (int8_t)0;      /* indicate that LCA not found */
00185                         ip = (int8_t)1;  /* enter target and its superstate */
00186                         path[1] = t;       /* save the superstate of target */
00187                         t = me->state;                /* save source->super */
00188 
00189                         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00190                         r = (*path[1])(me);    /* find target->super->super */
00191                         while (r == Q_RET_SUPER) {
00192                             path[++ip] = me->state; /* store the entry path */
00193                             if (me->state == s) {      /* is it the source? */
00194                                 iq = (int8_t)1;  /* indicate that LCA found */
00195                                             /* entry path must not overflow */
00196                                 Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00197                                 --ip;            /* do not enter the source */
00198                                 r = Q_RET_HANDLED;    /* terminate the loop */
00199                             }
00200                             else {   /* it is not the source, keep going up */
00201                                 r = (*me->state)(me);    /* superstate of t */
00202                             }
00203                         }
00204                         if (iq == (int8_t)0) {    /* the LCA not found yet? */
00205 
00206                                             /* entry path must not overflow */
00207                             Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00208 
00209                             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;
00210                             (void)(*s)(me);              /* exit the source */
00211 
00212                                 /* (f) check the rest of source->super
00213                                  *                  == target->super->super...
00214                                  */
00215                             iq = ip;
00216                             r = Q_RET_IGNORED;    /* indicate LCA NOT found */
00217                             do {
00218                                 s = path[iq];
00219                                 if (t == s) {           /* is this the LCA? */
00220                                     r = Q_RET_HANDLED;/* indicate LCA found */
00221                                     ip = (int8_t)(iq - 1);/*do not enter LCA*/
00222                                     iq = (int8_t)(-1);/* terminate the loop */
00223                                 }
00224                                 else {
00225                                     --iq; /* try lower superstate of target */
00226                                 }
00227                             } while (iq >= (int8_t)0);
00228 
00229                             if (r != Q_RET_HANDLED) { /* LCA not found yet? */
00230                                     /* (g) check each source->super->...
00231                                      * for each target->super...
00232                                      */
00233                                 r = Q_RET_IGNORED;          /* keep looping */
00234                                 do {
00235                                                        /* exit t unhandled? */
00236                                     Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_EXIT_SIG;
00237                                     if ((*t)(me) == Q_RET_HANDLED) {
00238                                         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00239                                         (void)(*t)(me);  /* find super of t */
00240                                     }
00241                                     t = me->state;    /*  set to super of t */
00242                                     iq = ip;
00243                                     do {
00244                                         s = path[iq];
00245                                         if (t == s) {       /* is this LCA? */
00246                                                         /* do not enter LCA */
00247                                             ip = (int8_t)(iq - 1);
00248                                             iq = (int8_t)(-1);/*break inner */
00249                                             r = Q_RET_HANDLED;/*break outer */
00250                                         }
00251                                         else {
00252                                             --iq;
00253                                         }
00254                                     } while (iq >= (int8_t)0);
00255                                 } while (r != Q_RET_HANDLED);
00256                             }
00257                         }
00258                     }
00259                 }
00260             }
00261         }
00262                     /* retrace the entry path in reverse (desired) order... */
00263         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_ENTRY_SIG;
00264         for (; ip >= (int8_t)0; --ip) {
00265             (void)(*path[ip])(me);                        /* enter path[ip] */
00266         }
00267         t = path[0];                      /* stick the target into register */
00268         me->state = t;                          /* update the current state */
00269 
00270                                       /* drill into the target hierarchy... */
00271         Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_INIT_SIG;
00272         while ((*t)(me) == Q_RET_TRAN) {
00273             ip = (int8_t)0;
00274 
00275             path[0] = me->state;
00276             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)QEP_EMPTY_SIG_;
00277             (void)(*me->state)(me);                  /* find the superstate */
00278             while (me->state != t) {
00279                 path[++ip] = me->state;
00280                 (void)(*me->state)(me);              /* find the superstate */
00281             }
00282             me->state = path[0];
00283                                             /* entry path must not overflow */
00284             Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00285 
00286             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_ENTRY_SIG;
00287             do {    /* retrace the entry path in reverse (correct) order... */
00288                 (void)(*path[ip])(me);                    /* enter path[ip] */
00289             } while ((--ip) >= (int8_t)0);
00290 
00291             t = path[0];
00292             Q_SIG(me) = (QSignal)Q_INIT_SIG;
00293         }
00294     }
00295     me->state = t;            /* set new state or restore the current state */
00296 }
00297 
00298 #endif                                                            /* Q_NHSM */
